import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Box,Checkbox,Typography,List,ListItem,ListItemIcon,ListItemText}from'@mui/material';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TODOS=[{text:'ÏòÅÏñ¥Ï±Ö 1Í∂å ÏùΩÍ∏∞',emoji:'üìö',color:'#ffe0b2'},{text:'ÌïúÍ∏ÄÏ±Ö 1Í∂å ÏùΩÍ∏∞',emoji:'üìñ',color:'#c8e6c9'},{text:'ÎÇ¥ÏÖîÎÑê ÏßÄÏò§Í∑∏ÎûòÌîΩ 1Í∂å ÏùΩÍ∏∞',emoji:'üåè',color:'#b3e5fc'},{text:'Íµ¨Î™¨ ÏàòÌïô ÌíÄÍ∏∞',emoji:'‚ûó',color:'#f8bbd0'},{text:'ÏõåÎì§Î¶¨ ÏôÄÏù¥Ï¶à 2Ï™Ω ÌíÄÍ∏∞',emoji:'üìù',color:'#fff9c4'}];const getStorageKey=(person,date)=>"todo-".concat(person,"-").concat(date);const TodoList=_ref=>{let{person,date,month}=_ref;const[checked,setChecked]=useState([false,false,false,false,false]);useEffect(()=>{const saved=localStorage.getItem(getStorageKey(person,date));if(saved){setChecked(JSON.parse(saved));}else{setChecked([false,false,false,false,false]);}},[person,date]);const handleToggle=idx=>{const newChecked=[...checked];newChecked[idx]=!newChecked[idx];setChecked(newChecked);localStorage.setItem(getStorageKey(person,date),JSON.stringify(newChecked));};// Ïò§ÎäòÏùò Ï†êÏàò
const todayScore=checked.filter(Boolean).length*20;// Ïù¥Îã¨Ïùò Ï†êÏàò Í≥ÑÏÇ∞
const getMonthScore=()=>{let total=0;// Ìï¥Îãπ ÏõîÏùò 1~31Ïùº Î™®Îëê Ï°∞Ìöå
for(let d=1;d<=31;d++){const dayStr="".concat(month,"-").concat(d.toString().padStart(2,'0'));const saved=localStorage.getItem(getStorageKey(person,dayStr));if(saved){const arr=JSON.parse(saved);total+=arr.filter(v=>v).length*20;}}return total;};const monthScore=getMonthScore();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mb:2,alignItems:'flex-start'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",sx:{fontWeight:600,mb:1},children:[person," To do list"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",sx:{mb:1},children:["\uC624\uB298\uC758 \uC810\uC218: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:todayScore}),"\uC810 / \uC774\uB2EC\uC758 \uC810\uC218: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:monthScore}),"\uC810"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{dense:true,children:TODOS.map((todo,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{disablePadding:true,sx:{py:0,minHeight:0,mb:0,'&:not(:last-child)':{marginBottom:0},background:checked[idx]?todo.color:'#fff',borderRadius:2,transition:'background 0.2s'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{sx:{minWidth:36,ml:1,mr:0},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{edge:"start",checked:checked[idx],tabIndex:-1,disableRipple:true,onChange:()=>handleToggle(idx),sx:{color:checked[idx]?'#ff9800':undefined}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontSize:22,marginRight:4},children:todo.emoji}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:todo.text,sx:{textDecoration:checked[idx]?'line-through':'none',color:checked[idx]?'text.disabled':'text.primary',fontWeight:500,fontSize:16}})]})]},todo.text))})]});};export default TodoList;
